articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Media appearances

5:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on OMNI TV 1 with Sergio Mourato.

6:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on The Brandon Gonez Show.
